org.sat4j.tools

Class Backbone

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sat4j.tools.Backbone

  • public final class Backbone
extends java.lang.Object
    The aim of this class is to compute efficiently the literals implied by the set of constraints (also called backbone or unit implicates). The work has been done in the context of ANR BR4CP.
    Author:
    leberre

      • compute

        public IVecInt compute(ISolver solver)
                throws TimeoutException
        Throws:

      • compute

        public IVecInt compute(ISolver solver,
                       IVecInt assumptions)
                throws TimeoutException
        Computes the backbone of a formula.
        Parameters:
        solver - a solver containing a satisfiable set of constraints.
        assumptions - a set of literals to satisfy
        Returns:
        the backbone of the solver when the assumptions are satisfied
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - if the computation cannot be done within the timeout
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if solver is unsatisfiable

      • compute

        public IVecInt compute(ISolver solver,
                       IVecInt assumptions,
                       IVecInt filter)
                throws TimeoutException
        Computes the backbone of a formula.
        Parameters:
        solver - a solver containing a satisfiable set of constraints.
        assumptions - a set of literals to satisfy
        filter - a set of variables
        Returns:
        the backbone of the solver restricted to the variables of filter when the assumptions are satisfied
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - if the computation cannot be done within the timeout
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if solver is unsatisfiable

      • compute

        public IVecInt compute(ISolver solver,
                       int[] implicant)
                throws TimeoutException
        Computes the backbone of a formula.
        Parameters:
        solver - a solver containing a satisfiable set of constraints.
        implicant - an implicant of solver
        Returns:
        the backbone of the solver
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - if the computation cannot be done within the timeout

      • compute

        public IVecInt compute(ISolver solver,
                       int[] implicant,
                       IVecInt assumptions)
                throws TimeoutException
        Computes the backbone of a formula.
        Parameters:
        solver - a solver containing a satisfiable set of constraints.
        implicant - an implicant of solver
        assumptions - a set of literals to satisfy
        Returns:
        the backbone of the solver when the assumptions are satisfied
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - if the computation cannot be done within the timeout

      • getNumberOfSatCalls

        public int getNumberOfSatCalls()
        Returns the number of calls to the SAT solver needed to compute the backbone.
        Returns:
        the number of underlying calls to the SAT solver.
